title: Executive Order 5448-Power-Site Restoration No. 447, White River, Arkansas
content: So much of the order of December 18, 1915, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 514, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 19 N., R. 14 W., sec. 19, NW. ¼ of NE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5448-Power-Site Restoration No. 447, White River, Arkansas Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373069
